name: Pale Blue VR
description:
The story

Earth has be shrunk by some evil aliens and now have sent their miniture army to finish it off!

How to play

The goal: Get through the asteriod belt and take your beloved earth to the sun so it may live on for another day.

Locomotion: In the game there are three ways to move.

1. Press both triggers to move up.

2. Use the left joystick to move about.

3. Reach behind your shoulder to grab a teleport ball. Throw it and in a few seconds you will be teleported to its location.
